content.query:
--Query From Folder Using Wildcard Path
SELECT  
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS results;

-- Query from subfolders
SELECT  
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS results;

--Use File Name Function
SELECT  
    result.filename()
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS result;


-- use file path to target partition
SELECT  
    result.filename() AS file_name, 
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS result
    WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020' and result.filepath(2) = '01'
    ORDER BY result.filepath(1) DESC;
